title: Was Valos deliberately added to the artwork for the VHS cover under the title "The Little Mermaid "?
subtitle: Rumor has it that an artist down on Disney sought revenge on the company by drawing a castle spear in the form of a male sexual organ.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The cover of Disney's home film "The Little Mermaid" includes a waterfall deliberately painted by the disgruntled artist.
